title: Float
content:
View on GitHub Float Toggle floats on any element, across any breakpoint, using our responsive float utilities. On this page On this page Overview Responsive CSS Sass utilities API Overview These utility classes float an element to the left or right, or disable floating, based on the current viewport size using the CSS float property. !important is included to avoid specificity issues. These use the same viewport breakpoints as our grid system. Please be aware float utilities have no effect on flex items. Use the clearfix helper on a parent element to clear floats.Responsive Responsive variations also exist for each float value.
